original_title: Harass our supporters and pay the penalty: Prasanna
original_body_lines: Minister Prasanna Ranatunga addressing a Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna (SLPP) meeting in Minuwangoda warned that anyone who harassed his party supporters will have to pay the penalty.
“Harass our supporters and they will have to pay the penalty with interest,” he said, adding that he will not threaten anyone.
Ranatunga also said that he has been most critical of President Ranil Wickremesinghe in the past.
“Nobody criticized Ranil Wickremesinghe as much as I did. But after the events of May 9th, nobody wanted to take on the responsibility,” he said.
